title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 17, ch. IV, subch. A, pt. 100 - Interest On Payments Pursuant To Agreements Of Adjustment Or Agreements For Partial Payment Of Claims Arising Out Of The Appropriation Of Property
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 17, ch. IV, subch. A, pt. 100 - Interest On Payments Pursuant To Agreements Of Adjustment Or Agreements For Partial Payment Of Claims Arising Out Of The Appropriation Of Property

State Regulations
§ 100.1 - Negotiated settlements
§ 100.2 to 100.9 - Repealed

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 17, ch. IV, subch. A, pt. 100

Statutory authority: Highway Law, §§29, 30, 347; Canal Law, §40; Transportation Law, §228

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
